犍.definition: used in 犍為|犍为[Qian2wei4], a country in Sichuan

犍為.definition: Qianwei county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

犍為縣.definition: Qianwei county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

犍陀羅.definition: Gandhara Kingdom in northwest India, c. 600 BC-11 AD, on Kabul River in Vale of Peshawar
